control.description-key: HoverEventControl grants the ability to track hover events on standard PowerApps components

property.name: controlName
property.description-key: Name of the PowerApps control to track

property.name: enterDelay
property.description-key: Delay (in ms) before triggering the Enter event

property.name: leaveDelay
property.description-key: Delay (in ms) before triggering the Leave event

property.name: enableEnterDelay
property.description-key: Enables a delay (in ms) before triggering the Enter event

property.name: enableLeaveDelay
property.description-key: Enables a delay (in ms) before triggering the Leave event

property.name: refreshTrigger
property.description-key: When items in the gallery change, you may need to refresh all the listeners for that gallery

property.name: hasEntered
property.description-key: Indicates whether the pointer has entered the control

property.name: hasLeft
property.description-key: Indicates whether the pointer has left the control

property.name: innerGalleryIndex
property.description-key: Index of the control within the immediate (inner) gallery, if any

property.name: outerGalleryIndex
property.description-key: Index of the control within the external (outer) gallery, if any
